website_summaries.verdict: Feature-rich cameras and an attractive build help push Cricket's prepaid Samsung Galaxy Grand Prime past other budget rivals that also cost under $200.
pros: The Samsung Galaxy Grand Prime has LTE and front and rear cameras that turn out decent photos
cons: Its low screen resolution makes videos and games look pixelated, and download speeds are on the slow side

customer_reviews.title: durable but glitchy sometimes
customer_reviews.text: My SIM card didn't fit at first like the description said it would, it was to small but I put an extension to make the SIM bigger and that worked, When I first turned the phone on it was in Spanish so I had difficulty changing the language back. My phone freezes a lot and closes out of apps often other then that it's a great phone and I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Headphone jack
customer_reviews.text: I'm not able to use the headphone jack. So far that's the only issue I've had.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Had to return this item. When i tried to ...
customer_reviews.text: Had to return this item. When i tried to put my SIM card in something was lodged in the slot .
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Waldren

customer_reviews.title: If anyone is looking to buy a smart phone with small budget
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone for my mom. She likes it so far. This phone works well since the phone shipped over to my house. Hardware: This phone has no technical or hardware problem . Apps: Simple and efficient to use for anyone. All applications works well. If anyone is looking to buy a smart phone with small budget, Buying Samsung Galaxy is not a bad choice.
customer_reviews.author: Rafiur Chowdhury

customer_reviews.title: Phone only works sometime i gave this to my granddaughter ...
customer_reviews.text: Phone only works sometime i gave this to my granddaughter and when she calls me or i call her she can hear me but i can't hear her. so 1 star it gets
customer_reviews.author: TINA JONES

customer_reviews.title: The phone it self is fine.
customer_reviews.text: Just bought this phone a few days ago and as I was setting it up I realized it was an AT&T phone not an (unlocked) one. I looked to get a replacement but the only ones left are used. So now I have 2 choices. 1 keep it and pay to unlock it or return for refund. This is now the 4th time I bought an unlocked phone and had this happen. Will repost if any information comes to light about this problem.
customer_reviews.author: panther83

customer_reviews.title: Battery Charge Bad!
customer_reviews.text: Have my phone for over a year now , but since day one I cant upload a lot of apps not even the basic ones like Facebook,Instagram etc it constantly tells me to free up space when I don't have a lot stored. The battery is bad you charge it full and when you don't even use it and if little it goes way down I constantly have to charge the phone. I like Samsung products but this phone by far the worse for me just use it for basic texts and emails. Looking to buy another one hopefully I have better luck!!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Low end device, slow, failed after 1 year 2 months of light use
customer_reviews.text: I've had this phone for about a little over a year. My main complaint is that it is a lot slower than other comparable models. Frequently it freezes up for 10-20 seconds, then starts responding again. It does however have a great display like most Samsung devices do and the camera is decent. The phone came with a 1 year warranty. With light use, the phone finally failed completely after 1 year and 2 months of light use. Just 2 months past the warranty. I am not sure if these lower end Samsung devices are worth it. I may look for another brand next time.
customer_reviews.author: OTG w/chickens

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The phone doesn't ring. It stopped after one months. Everything else work though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: absolutely loved it. Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This was my first cell phone, absolutely loved it. Easy to use, great photo's etc.
customer_reviews.author: Caryns Creations

product_meta.title: Samsung Galaxy Grand Prime Smartphone - Unlocked - White
product_meta.description:
With elegant curves and a brushed metallic bezel, the Samsung Galaxy Grand Prime embodies premium style. Plus, its slim profile fits your palm perfectly—so navigating, multitasking and browsing on the go are effortless. See more than ever on a full-touch 5.0" qHD display. Photos come to life with incredible detail and vibrant color on the wider graphic display. And with more room to view, you'll also get the ultimate video and gaming experience. 

Capture more faces (and more fun) with the wide-angle, 5MP front-facing camera. And when you want to capture everything else, the Galaxy Grand Prime is equipped with a rear-facing 8MP camera. So no matter what your angle, you're capturing everything in brilliant detail. 

With 4G LTE connection speeds, the Galaxy Grand Prime keeps you up to the second on everything you do. Upload or download large files easily, video chat with friends, plus get all your social network updates in real time. And with the improved features from Android 5.1, Lollipop, the Galaxy Grand Prime is simpler to use than ever before.
feature_bullets: Android v4.4.2 (Kit Kat), Quad-Core 1.2 GHz Cortex-A53 Processor, Chipset: Qualcomm MSM8916 Snapdragon 41, Adriano 306 Graphics
8 Megapixel Camera (3264 x 2448 pixels) w/ Autofocus, LED Flash + Front-Facing 5 Megapixel Camera
Internal Memory: 8GB, 1GB RAM + micro SD Slot Expandable up to 64GB

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars35 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
